required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Saffron Extract Supplementation on Emotional Well-being Alterations
clinical_study.official_title: Investigation of the Effect of Saffron Extract Supplementation on Emotional Well-being Alterations in Healthy Volunteers: a Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Institut National de Recherche pour l'Agriculture, l'Alimentation et l'Environnement

clinical_study.source: Institut National de Recherche pour l'Agriculture, l'Alimentation et l'Environnement

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in emotional well-being composite score
primary_outcome.description: The primary endpoint is the change from baseline (V1) to 6 weeks (V2) in the composite Z-score of emotional well-being combining three components: depression (BDI score), anxiety (STAI state score) and fatigue (MFI score).

secondary_outcome.description: Visual analog scale for stress (score 0 to 10).
The Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index (PSQI) (score 0 to 21).
Medical Outcome Study Short Form 12 (SF-12) (score 0 to 100).

Subjects will complete a food diary in which they will register all the food and drinks consumed during 3 defined days (two weekdays and one weekend day). The Programme national nutrition santé (PNNS) questionnaire is a non-quantitative food frequency questionnaire. The 12 items are based on the recommendations of the French National Nutrition and Health.
Salivary cortisol as a measure of the stress response system.
Blood levels of acute phase proteins and cytokines.
Blood oxidative stress markers such as malondialdehyde (MDA), total antioxidant capacity (TCA) and superoxide dismutase (SOD) levels.
Blood and urine polyphenols and carotenoids levels.
Untargeted metabolomics analysis in blood and urine samples using nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) and/or liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry (LC-MS).
Lipids profile in red blood cells.

arm_group.description: Daily, two dietary supplements (Saffron extract) will be taken orally with water, the first one at breakfast and the second one at dinner. Dietary supplements in capsule form
Daily, two dietary supplements (Maltodextrin) will be taken orally with water, the first one at breakfast and the second at dinner. Dietary supplements in capsule form

intervention.description: Food supplements are taken during 6 weeks by healthy volunteers
Food supplements are taken during 6 weeks by healthy volunteers

overall_official.affiliation: INRAE-Laboratory of Nutrition And Integrative Neurobiology (NutriNeuro Lab)
